import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Add, Remove, CreditCard, Archive, DirectionsCar } from '@material-ui/icons' import './Checkout.css' import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import { getSubTotal } from './reducer' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { db, time } from './firebase' export default function Checkout() { const [ {cart}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const ordersTable = db.collection("order"); console.log(currentUser.uid) const [ isPickup, setIsPickup] = useState(false); const [ isDelivery, setIsDelivery] = useState(false); const [ shipFee, setShipFee] = useState(0); const handlePDSelect = selection => (e) => { if(selection === "pickup"){ isPickup ? setIsPickup(false) : setIsPickup(true); setIsDelivery(false) }else if(selection === "delivery"){ isDelivery ? setIsDelivery(false) : setIsDelivery(true) setIsPickup(false) } } const handleShipFee = fee => () => { setShipFee(fee) } const sendOrderDetails = () => { if(currentUser){ } } return (

1. REVIEW ORDER

{ cart?.length && cart.map( product => (

{product.product_name}

Quantity

{product.quantity}

)) }

2. SELECT SHIPMENT METHOD

Pickup

{ isPickup && <>

Ksh. 100

Stations Within Nairobi, outside CBD

Ksh. 200

}

Within CBD

Ksh. 100

Within Nairobi, outside CBD

Ksh. 300

Outside Nairobi, in Kenya

Ksh. 400

}

3. SUBTOTAL

Subtotal

Ksh. {getSubTotal(cart)}

Shipment Fee

Ksh. {shipFee}

Order Total

Ksh. {getSubTotal(cart) + shipFee}

4. SELECT PAYMENT METHOD

Credit Card

Paypal

Cash on Delivery

{/*

*/}
{/* Closes the Flex Column */}
) }
